text: 17|110|(Ni shuo):“Nimen keyi cheng ta wei an la, ye ke cheng ta wei zhiren zhu. Yinwei ta you xuduo ji youmei de ming hao, nimen wulun yong shenme ming hao chenghu ta,(dou shi hen hao de).” Ni zai bai zhong buyao gao sheng langdu, ye buyao di sheng modu, ni yingdang xunqiu yitiao shizhong de daolu.
